channel.title: Best video drivers for crysis
channel.description: if any of you guys play crysis, you probably know its a big FPS hit on most pc's. i was looking for the best nvidia drivers for crysis that promise the most FPS gain. post them here

item.title: Best video drivers for crysis
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

Go with the PhysX drivers for the 88xx series. Either way with different drivers, there’s only going to be a few fps difference (give or take) Though i did bump into a driver that was really shitty and always blanked out my monitor.

Also if you really don’t care that much about shadows (like me) put them on low, as it takes a lot off the video card.

Read full topic
